Articles.Content:
Hello everybody,

On December 20th will be a charity livestream of which the lights have never seen.

It is gonna be on www.twitch.tv/deamonsauce

Scain40, Deamonsauce and WeWillRock245 will be there for sure and many other awesome people will surelly join us.

Hope to see you all there, remember it is for charity.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rjX4JdLX6qA
